e7ddefdf-6a5d-4c7b-9055-826a3cd2899a.name: Silence
e7ddefdf-6a5d-4c7b-9055-826a3cd2899a.notes: Bonuses help only when hearing is the only sense that can be used to detect you.

features.situation: to Stealth when you are perfectly motionless
to Stealth if moving (even in armor, etc.)

6f4c71a7-94dd-4cfb-9fef-12c214ef0d12.name: Dependency (Sentient brains)
6f4c71a7-94dd-4cfb-9fef-12c214ef0d12.notes: Fresh brains from sentient beings no more than 1 week dead, illegal, monthly.  Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose.

features.situation: from others who can see your looks

68478645-fc9f-4bb2-bc59-67a0eb74aca6.name: If living among orcs, select Degenerate

def3b2f0-c38e-4584-9bc7-ba2aa7ec25a5.text: Ghouls are pallid, hairless humanoids. They have splayed, clawed hands, and long, thin limbs. Their faces are narrow, with pointed ears, long noses, and sharp chins. They have broad mouths filled with small, sharply-pointed teeth. They usually wear clothing – mostly ancient human finery and grave-clothes for which the original owner has no further use (height is normal for ST, weight is 20 pounds lighter than normal).
